DescriptionData.Title: BBQ Grill with Electricity,Non-Stick Baking Pan alloy For 3-5 People Korean Round Carbon Grill Convenient Home Barbecue Grill
DescriptionData.Description:
★ Welcome to the paradise of YXYLD. The shop will be adding more and more high-quality products. Welcome to order.

★ Party with your family and friends, barbecue is your best choice.
- This Portable Barbecues grill but powerful. The grill is made of stainless stainless steel and easy to clean after use.
- Lightweight and compact, which means this barbecue grill is perfect for camping, spontaneous picnics and use in the garden

★ Specifications:
- Name: Barbecue Grill
- Packing size: 45.5 *31.5 * 38cm (17.9 * 12.4 *15in)
- Practical number: 3-5 people
- Colour: Red or black
- Use environment: terrace, courtyard, garden,indoor
- Net weight: about 8KG
- Material: alloy

★ Warm prompt:
1. Before each use, check to make sure all parts and fasteners are tightened and installed in place to ensure safe barbecue.
2. During the barbecue process, if you want to touch the stove, please wear gloves or tools with heat insulation function to avoid burns.
3. After each use of the oven, the necessary cleaning can increase the service life of the oven.

★ Parcel list:
1* Barbecue Grill

★ If you have any questions during or after the purchase, please feel free to contact us directly via email, we will answer your questions within 24 hours, thank you for purchasing the goods in our store. wish you a happy life!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ Maifanshi non-stick baking tray: healthy and easy to clean with less oil fume, non-stick bottom and easy to clean.
★ Automatic rotation: 360 ° automatic rotation of the grill plate, one-click capture of delicious, 3D rotation function, the control switch automatically rotates.
★ Intelligent oil-conducting design: discharge excess grease, built-in large-capacity oil receiving box.
★ 3D infrared heating technology: no glare, no eye injury, more uniform heating, almost no oil fume.
★ Perfect gift: for barbecue, picnic, camping or on the terrace, indoor, park, beach, carnival with your friends and family.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: mini BBQ grill barbecue cooking large table top charcoal stainless steel carbon portable foldable outdoor indoor suitable picnic stays with carry bag or camping backpacking char broil slatted aluminium compact the low-smoke campers hikers stove
